wikipedia_page.main: Chris Bourne (born 6 September 1985) is an English football player of Guyanese descent who plays for Harlow Town.

response: Roberts gained two caps for Guyana in 2008. He made his debut in a home friendly against Cuba in the 0–0 draw on 22 February, and his second cap in the 2–1 win against Cuba on 24 February, alongside his Canvey Island teammate Chris Bourne.
